sentences.sContent: The main cause of women's and children's oppression is patriarchy.
sentences.sCn: 妇女及儿童受欺压的主要根源在于父权制度。

words.tran: 家长的；族长的；由族长统治的

trans.tranCn: 父权制， 父系社会， 家长统治
trans.tranOther: a social system in which the oldest man rules his family and passes power and possessions on to his sons
